thread.title: Karen
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Karen

author: Karen
title: Karen
text: During our initial visit to the Lewisville location, we worked with Stephanie. She was extremely knowledgeable and helpful and she made our experience a pleasure! When we returned to buy our furniture, we worked with Jose who was also very helpful. He completed our transaction smoothly with no issues. When we've finished paying off our living room furniture, we'll definitely be back for further furniture purchases. Thank you all for a very pleasurable shopping experience!
